IRS990.Desc: INDEPENDENT MIDDLE SCHOOL SERVING RI AREA YOUTH IN GRADES 4 TO 8. THE SCHOOL EMPHASIZES INDIVIDUAL ATTENTION AND PARENTAL INVOLVEMENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COMMUNITY PREP ADVERTISES IN THE SPRING OF EACH YEAR WITH OTHER MEMBERS OF THE INDEPENDENT SCHOOL ASSOCIATION OF RI IN THE PROVIDENCE SUNDAY JOURNAL COMMUNITY PREP ADVERTISES IN THE SPRING OF EACH YEAR WITH OTHER MEMBERS OF THE INDEPENDENT SCHOOL ASSOCIATION OF RI IN THE PROVIDENCE SUNDAY JOURNAL
THE CHAIRPERSON OF THE FINANCE COMMITTEE AND THE HEAD OF SCHOOL REVIEW THE FORM 990 BEFORE IT IS FILED WITH THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE.
BOARD MEMBERS REVIEW AND SIGN CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ANNUALLY.
BOARD REVIEWS SALARY OF HEAD OF SCHOOL AND KEY EMPLOYEES AND DETERMINES COMPENSATION PACKAGE. THE REVIEW IS ALSO BASED ON PERFORMANCE OF SCHOOL.

THE ORGANIZATION PRESENTS ITS GOVERNINING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS TO THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES AND THE FINANCE COMMITTEE. ONCE THEY ARE APPROVED, THE DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE FOR REVIEW BY ANYONE WHO WANTS TO SEE THEM.
THERE HAVE NOT BEEN ANY CHANGES TO PROCESS FROM PRIOR YEARS.
BOARD REVIEWS SALARY OF HEAD OF SCHOOL AND KEY EMPLOYEES AND DETERMINES COMPENSATION PACKAGE. THE REVIEW IS ALSO BASED ON PERFORMANCE OF SCHOOL.
